enumdef.name: lv_chart_type
enumdef.help: How the chart draws its data series

enum.name: line
enum.help: Draw data points as connected lines

enum.name: stacked
enum.help: Draw series as stacked bars on top of each other

enum.name: scatter
enum.help: Draw data points as unconnected dots

enumdef.name: lv_chart_update_mode
enumdef.help: How the chart handles new data points

enum.name: shift
enum.help: Shift old data to the left when new points are added

enum.name: circular
enum.help: Overwrite the oldest data in a circular buffer style

enumdef.name: lv_chart_axis
enumdef.help: Which axis a series belongs to

prop.name: type
prop.help: Choose how the chart should draw its data

prop.name: point_count
prop.help: Set how many data points each series stores

prop.name: update_mode
prop.help: Choose how the chart updates when adding new points

prop.name: hor_div_line_count
prop.help: Show this many horizontal division lines

prop.name: ver_div_line_count
prop.help: Show this many vertical division lines

element.name: series
element.help: Add a data series to the chart

arg.name: color
arg.help: Set the color of the series

arg.name: axis
arg.help: Choose which axis the series belongs to

prop.name: values
prop.help: Provide the data values of the series

element.name: cursor
element.help: Add a cursor indicator to the chart

arg.name: color
arg.help: Set the color of the cursor

arg.name: dir
arg.help: Choose the direction of the cursor

prop.name: pos_x
prop.help: Set the X position of the cursor

prop.name: pos_y
prop.help: Set the Y position of the cursor

element.name: axis
element.help: Configure the range of a chart axis

prop.name: min_value
prop.help: Set the minimum value of the axis

prop.name: max_value
prop.help: Set the maximum value of the axis
